text: I was almost able to go from one end to the other...

Trainer-san comes up with interesting things,
like incorporating an "Egg Race" into balance lessons.

Balancing a ping pong ball on a spoon while walking
is really difficult, Producer-san, want to give it a try?

Yeah, sure, let me try for a bit.
Pass me a spoon.

Um, first,
put the ping pong ball on the spoon──

...Ehehe,
first, let's start with getting it to balance, right?
